feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud

entry.title: Hide company code by default
entry.content:
Hi all,
we need a company code in our SAP public cloud system, which should be by default not be seen by anyone. Only to some users, for which we would create additonal roles where needed. Alternative option would be to create additional roles and restrict one to not see the company code, and allow the other role to see it. But that sounds like many roles to be duplicated across the system. Any idea how to handle that?

Many thanks
Tobias

entry.title: Copy Text from Sevrice Order to Billing Document
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

I am working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Service 
 
I would like to transfer a text object from the Service Order to the corresponding billing document (e.g. billing information for the customer). Which text type is not relevant, currently NO texts are copied/transferred (from my understanding)

Important: the text I want to maintain is only known AFTER creating a service confirmation.

Do you have an idea how to realize this (without custom fields?)

BR
Simon

entry.title: Repair order planned costs double upon release status
entry.content:
Why the repair order planned costs double upon releasing the repair order item.

Thank you.

entry.title: Add New Condition Types and Account Keys in Existing Tax Procedure in SAP S4HANA Public Cloud.
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

We have raise a ticket with the reference of  ticket number - 1415730.

 

 Subject: Unable to Add New Condition Types and Account Keys in Existing Tax Procedure

Required: we want to add the New condition types and Account keys in Tax procedure

Issue: We need to add new condition types and account keys to our existing tax procedure. However, the system is not allowing us to create new entries. The procedure appears in edit mode, but the New Entries option is disabled and the fields remain locked.

Request:
Please assist in enabling the New Entries option for adding condition types and account keys in the tax procedure, or provide the necessary corrections so that we can update the configuration.

Please find the attached file for your reference.

 

Regards.

Asma shaik

entry.title: SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF be in "Business Role Template"
entry.content:
Hi All

I activated scope item Internal Project Management ‚Äì Project-Based Services (1A8) and Customer Project Management ‚Äì Project-Based Services (J11).
I tried to find SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF in "Business Role Template" to assign a business role, but I couldn't find it.
If I activate the scope item above, shouldn't SAP_BR_PROJECT_MANAGER_PROF be in "Business Role Template"?

Thank you

entry.title: How many industries, countries/regions, and languages ‚Äã‚Äãdoes SAP S/4HANA Cloud support?
entry.content:
Hi Expert

How many industries, countries/regions, and languages ‚Äã‚Äãdoes SAP S/4HANA Cloud support?
Is it correct that the Private Edition supports 25 industries, 64 countries/regions, and 39 languages?
How many of each does the Public Edition support?

BR
Takashi

entry.title: How to consume s4 hana public cloud SOAP Outbound Service in CPI for replication
entry.content:
Hii Community,

Can someone help me out how to configure my Sender(S4 Public Cloud) and Consumer(CPI) system to replicate production order data from S4 to MES System through CPI?

I got replication SOAP service from api.sap.com which needs to be activated in SAP. Let me know if someone has done this kind of integration.

I appreciate your attention on question

Regards,

Omkar

entry.title: Reversing Debit/Credit Signs for Statistical Accounts in SD Billing
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm dealing with an SD customer invoice where the system also creates several statistical postings to accounts starting with ‚Äú9*‚Äù (for example 9xxxxxxxx). These accounts are purely informational and don‚Äôt affect financial balances.

The issue is that the FI document currently shows these statistical 9* accounts on the credit side, and the offsetting statistical accounts (transport/logistics type accounts) on the debit side.

The customer finds this layout confusing and is asking for the signs to be reversed so it looks more intuitive when they view the journal entry.

So the goal is:

  • 9* statistical account ‚Üí Debit

  • Offset statistical accounts ‚Üí Credit

This concerns only the statistical lines of the SD invoice, not the real accounting lines.

I‚Äôm trying to understand:
üëâ Where in SAP is the sign of these statistical postings controlled?

Is this usually done through:

  • Pricing procedure settings / account key

  • VKOA account determination

  • A pricing routine (VOFM)

  • Or a user-exit/BAdI like ACC_DOCUMENT that manipulates the FI document?

If anyone has experience changing the sign for statistical condition postings in SD billing, I‚Äôd appreciate guidance on where to look.

Thanks!

entry.title: Letter of Credit payment
entry.content:
Dear SAP

May I know if SAP can provide a standard process of letter of credit payment? The funds can beed paid to bank but not yet paid to the customer, how should the kind of business initiate financial approval on the business side before posting?

Thanks and regards

Justine

entry.title: Intermittent DBSQL_SQL_INTERNAL_DB_ERROR When Calling Trial Balance CDS View C_TRIALBALANCE_CDS
entry.content:
When calling the standard C_TRIALBALANCE_CDS OData service with a valid date range and filters, the request intermittently fails with DBSQL_SQL_INTERNAL_DB_ERROR. The issue appears more often when the $select clause includes many dimensions, even though the same request sometimes works. Looking for guidance on why this CDS view can return this error under higher-volume or more detailed selections.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to prevent the automatic creation of delivery and invoice of customer returns
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

After creating a returns order (CBAR), either through app or API, the system automatically executes two processes:

  • Automatic creation of delivery document;
  • Automatic creation of invoice.

Is it possible to prevent those automatic creations or delay it in any way?

Thank you.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Flexible Workflow for purchase order "Email notification Request for approval"
entry.content:
Hello,

We have setup flexible workflow for purchase orders. The requirement is to send a Email notification notifying the approver that a purchase order is pending his/her approval. In the flexible workflow setup, I have seen standard email templates for "Approved" and "Rejected" purchase orders, but not for "To be approved" purchase orders.  As this seems to be a standard requirement, I am wondering if the "To be approved" notification is differently triggered? If not, is there a way to develop this? 

Thanks for any input!

entry.title: Packaging Instruction Determination Not Triggering Dialog in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I‚Äôm having trouble with the packaging instruction determination in Public Cloud for Warehouse Management.

In configuration, under
Logistics, Transportation, and Warehousing / Tracking, Tracing, and Identification / Packing / Maintain Packing Transaction Profile,
for transaction profiles 0001 and 0025, I assigned the Determination Procedure for Packaging Instructions ‚Äú000013‚Äù and enabled both ‚ÄúPacking Instruction Selection Dialog‚Äù and ‚ÄúRespect Alternative Packing Instruction.‚Äù

However, when I press the Packing button in the inbound delivery (VL31N) or when using the Change Inbound Deliveries app, no selection dialog appears, even though multiple alternative packaging instructions exist.

Is there something I‚Äôm missing? Is an additional step required to make the dialog appear?

Thanks in advance for any insights

entry.title: Cost center determination logic in Price difference when running MIGO for Purchaseorder.
entry.content:
Dear Community
I have a question of determination logic of cost center when there is price difference between standard price and price in the purchase order.

This is my example)
Material A : standard price = 5100, valuation class = 7920 and Profit center = YB110
And PO Prices for Material A is 6000

So, When I run the MIGO based on that PO# I got this post result's in the system.

When I see the Lineitem 001, the profit center is successfully determined based on Material's profit center.

But, when I see the lineitem 003 for price difference, the profit center is different from Material. (not YB110)

So, I checked the Default Account Assignments for cost element 52041000, but there is no default profit center or costcenter in my partner system.

I want to know the determination logic of cost center and profit center for price difference 52041000 (Loss Prc Var PRD)

Kindly share your knowledge
Best Regards,

entry.title: Posting a price difference with a variance account?
entry.content:
is there any alternative to allow the po item with account to post a price difference with a variance account?

The scenario is below;

  1. I created a PO with an account assignment category 'K' and some account.
  2. I try to post a supplier invoice with some price difference

    I want the price difference to be posted with an account "52041000 " but now the difference is posted with an account that I specified on a PO item.

    2761621 - Price difference postings: KBS and BSX - SAP ERP & SAP S/4HANA - SAP for Me„ÄÄ

    I checked this note that says it's a standard system behavior, but I want to know if there is any alternative way.

entry.title: Failed to post Physical Inventory Document due to unknown reconciliation issue Code: M7059
entry.content:
We are trying to post Physical Inventory Document which failed. We have checked Account Auto-Determination, and make sure that GBB is assigned to account DIGITS.

Diagnosis

No direct postings can be made to the G/L account (because it is a reconciliation account).

System Response

The system cannot post the amount to this account.

Procedure

If the system has determined the G/L account, the system setting is faulty. Contact your systems administrator.

If you have entered the G/L account manually, enter a different account or cancel the account entered, so that the system determines an account automatically.

Message no. M7059

 

When we view account in app Manage G/L Account Master we cannot see assignment to reconciliation account. 

 

 

 

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Packing instruction and determination by using reference material - Public Cloud WM
entry.content:
Hi,
I am setting up packing instruction using reference material. According to documentation, the you need to :
1. Create reference material (in my example ref-pallet1) (VERP) which is maintained on products (WMTG12) which are packed same way as reference material. On material WMTG12 reference mat.for packing is maintained.

 

2. Then packing instruction is created for reference materials ref-pallet1. Row is marked with R.

3. Determination is maintained for 0IBD Inbound delivery

If I now test to pack in WM inbound delivery, it does not create HU automatically. 

If I maintain the determination for WMTG12 by using same packing instruction -> then system is able to pack according to instruction. Is this how it is supposed to work? I understood from SAP documentation that the determination would be maintained only for reference material?
